div.pre: 223 Anthedon, on the coast c. 15 km. NW (53) of Chalcis, Boeotia, 1935 Burial: c. 191 B.C. (T); c. 161 (Lewis) Contents: 25+ AR Chalcis: 4+ tetradr. 1 octob. ANS 1967.152.261 Eretria: 6+ tetradr. 4+ octob. ANS 1967.152.263 ANS 1944.100.22185 ANS 1967.152.264 ANS 1944.100.22186 Athens: 10 New Style tetradr.
